APEC Mandala is a good and affordable condotel right in the heart of Tuy Hoa City. I think its the tallest building in Tuy Hoa city.
1. It is located nect to the main road so transportation is not a hassle.
2. There are coffee shops and restaurant around.
3. It is a 5- minute walk to Vincom mall.
4. it is near Tuy Hoa beach.
5. Rooftop is a good place to see 360-degree view of Tuy Hoa city especially at night.

7. There is an infinity pool and small gym on the rooftop for 120k for a day pass.

It is a condotel that is good value for what you paid. Overall, I enjoyed my stay!

The hosts were very responsive and helpful. They told us that we could contact them for access to the gated motorbike parking area in case we planned on getting back past 10PM during our stay.
Our reservation said we had a room on the 2nd floor. Upon checking in, we found out our room was actually on the first floor. It wasn't a big deal. However, it is a little more difficult to get to your room if you're staying on the first floor. The front lobby / cafe area leads to a stairway up to the 2nd floor rooms.
